phone_input.title: Enter your mobile number
phone_input.small_note: By continuing you will received an SMS for verification. Message and data rates may apply.
phone_input.error_checkingNumberUnexpected: We were unable to check your mobile number due to an unexpected error, please check your internet connection and try again.
phone_input.unableToChangePhoneTaken: We were unable to change your phone number because the phone number which which you are trying to proceed is already linked to another account. Please use another phone number and try again.

otp_check.unableToSendCode_msg: We were unable to send you the 5-digit code due to an unexpected error, please check your internet connection and try again.
otp_check.incorrectCodeEntered: The code that you have entered is not correct, please double check in your SMS the latest 5-digit code that we've sent.
otp_check.enter5DigitCode: Enter the 5-digit code sent to you

create_account.accountDescription: With a DulcetDash account you will be able to make seamless rides, deliveries a even shop from various stores from the comfort of your couch.
create_account.unableToCreateAccUnexpected: We were unable to create your account due to an unexpected error, please check your internet connection and try again.
create_account.phoneTakenErrorUnexpected: We were unable to create your account because the phone number which which you are trying to proceed is already linked to another account. Please use another phone number and try again.

new_account.nameShouldBelong2: Should be at least 2 characters long.
new_account.unableToUpdateUnexpecteredErr: We were unable to update your account due to an unexpected error, please check your internet connection and try again.

rides.addNotePlaceholder: Anything you want your driver to do for your ride?
rides.addNOtePlaceholderSpecifications: Let us know if you require any specifications about your ride.
rides.pressForMoreDetails: Press here for more details about your trip.
rides.unableToSubmitRating_msg: We were unable to submit your rating due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.
rides.unableToCancelRide_msg: We were unable to cancel your ride request due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.
rides.cancelRideConfirmQuestion: Do you really want to cancel your ride request?
rides.cancelRideDescription_msg: By doing so you will not be able to get a driver to move you to your destination.
rides.haveRequestInPro_title: You have a request in progress
rides.haveRequestInPro_msg: We were unable to go forward with this ride request because it seems like you have an unconfirmed ride request in progress, please confirm it and try again.
rides.unableToRequest_msg: We were unable to go forward with your ride request due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.
rides.customAmountLimit_msg: Your custom fare should be between

delivery.whereAreYou_description: Enter the address where you wish your package to be picked up from.
delivery.whereToDropOff_description: Enter the address where you wish your package to be dropped off.
delivery.addNoteDescription: Tell us any specifications you want about your delivery.
delivery.deliveryNotePlaceholder: Let us know if you require any specifications about your delivery.
delivery.noRecipientsAdded: No recipients added for your delivery
delivery.haveRequestInPro_msg: We were unable to go forward with this delivery request because it seems like you have an unconfirmed delivery request in progress, please confirm it and try again.
delivery.unableToRequest_msg: We were unable to go forward with your delivery request due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.
delivery.unableToCancelDelivery_msg: We were unable to cancel your delivery request due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.
delivery.sendDeliveryMoney_msg: Please send your delivery money to us before we can start with your delivery.
delivery.shopperPickupCash_msg: Your shopper will pickup the cash from you before starting your shopping.
delivery.askForSecurityPin_msg: Ask your shopper to provide the security PIN displayed here first before giving any money.
delivery.seeDeliveredPackages_msg: You can see which packages are delivered.
delivery.cancelDeliveryConfirmation_msg: Do you really want to cancel your delivery request?
delivery.cancelDeliveryExplanation_msg: By doing so you will not be able to send your packages to your recipients.

shopping.noItemsForShopping: No items selected for your shopping.
shopping.shoppingNotePlaceholder: Tell us any specifications you want about your shopping.
shopping.shoppingRequirements_msg: Let us know if you require any specifications about your shopping.
shopping.clickToRemoveFromCart: Click to remove from your cart
shopping.unableToCancelShopping_msg: We were unable to cancel your shopping request due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.
shopping.sendShoppingMoney_request: Please send your shopping money to us before we can start with your shopping.
shopping.shopperPickupCashBefore: Your shopper will pickup the cash from you before starting your shopping.
shopping.askForSecurityPin_msg: Ask your shopper to provide the security PIN displayed here first before giving any money.
shopping.seeWhichItemsAreSold: You can see which items are shopped.
shopping.cancelShoppingConfirmation_msg: Do you really want to cancel your shopping request?
shopping.cancelShopping_explanation: By doing so you will not be able to get your items shopped and shipped to you.
shopping.unableToRequestShopping_msg: We were unable to go forward with this shopping request because it seems like you have an unconfirmed shopping request in progress, please confirm it and try again.
shopping.unableToRequestShoppingUnexpected_msg: We were unable to go forward with your shopping request due to an unexpected error, please try again and if it persists, please contact us through the Support tab.

support.mainTitle: We are available to help you 24/7h
support.explanation: If you have any concerns when it comes to your requests, deliveries or shopping, or for any additional information about DulcetDash, feel free to call or drop us a Whatsapp message.

share.mainTitle: Share DulcetDash with your friends and family.
share.explanation: Share the app to allow others to also be able to enjoy safe rides, perform seamless deliveries and shopping.
share.shareMessage: Hi!, there this awesome app called DulcetDash available in your town that allows you to get reliable rides, do deliveries to anywhere and do shoppings. Try it out and you will be satisfied, download it today.
share.shareSubject: Download DulcetDash for free! (Rides, deliveries and shoppings)

settings.name: Name
settings.unableToChangeData: Unable to change the {}. Try again later.
settings.namePrivacyExplanation: Your name will be viewed by your drivers, shoppers and couriers after you make a request for one of those services.
settings.surnamePrivacyExplanation: Your surname will not be viewed by your drivers, shoppers and couriers after you make a request for one of those services.
settings.emailPrivacyExplanation: Your email will not be viewed by your drivers, shoppers and couriers after you make a request for one of those services.
